data.title: Shirin Ebadi – Prize presentation
data.meta_description: The Nobel Peace Prize 2003 was awarded to Shirin Ebadi "for her efforts for democracy and human rights. She has focused especially on the struggle for the rights of women and children"
data.text:
Shirin Ebadi

Prize presentation

Your browser does not support the video tag.

Watch a video clip of the 2003 Nobel Peace Prize Laureate, Shirin Ebadi, receiving her Nobel Prize medal and diploma during the Nobel Peace Prize Award Ceremony at the Oslo City Hall in Norway, 10 December 2003.

To cite this section
